category.name: Workflow
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WRKFLW_change_target_lmu
preference.preference_description: Indicates whether the value of "last modified user" information for the workflow targets should be modified when modifying their release statuses during workflow. Valid Values: * true: the last modified user should be set to the current user. This is the default value. * false: the last modified user should not be modified.
